koncat-0.1.0.0: An experimental, modular IRC Bot

PortabilityLinux
StabilityUnstable
Maintainergrab@thereisnobreak.net
Safe HaskellNone

Koncat.Core.Native

Description

Koncat.Core.Native contains definitions for builtin functions. That is, they are directly executed by the Koncat runtime and are not accessing foreign modules.

Synopsis

  • isNative :: GenericIRC -> Maybe (GenericIRC -> IRC ())

Documentation

isNative :: GenericIRC -> Maybe (GenericIRC -> IRC ())Source

Determine whether an IRC Message is referring to a native function. Return the native function on success, or Nothing.
